sourcesContent:
<template>
  <main-layout
    :page-title="currentPage"
    :top-title="topTitle"
    :top-subtitle="topSubtitle"
    :bg-image="bgImage"
  >
    <template #mainContent>
      <router-view />
    </template>
  </main-layout>
</template>

<script>
import MainLayout from "./layouts/MainLayout.vue";

export default {
  provide() {
    return {
      setCurrentPage: this.setCurrentPage,
    };
  },
  components: {
    MainLayout,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      currentPage: "Home", // Default page title
      topTitle: "Welcome", // Default top title
      topSubtitle: "Enjoy your stay!", // Default top subtitle
      bgImage: "/path/to/default/image.jpg", // Default background image
    };
  },
  methods: {
    setCurrentPage(page) {
      this.currentPage = page;
    },
  },
  created() {
    // Example of setting up initial state or fetching data
    this.setCurrentPage("Home");
  },
};
</script>

<style>
body {
  font-family: "Jersey 15", serif;
  height: calc(100vh - 1px);
  overflow: hidden;
  background-blend-mode: overlay;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.65);
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: cover;
}

@media all and (max-width: 1200px) {
  body {
    height: auto;
  }
}
</style>
